  • Constructor Details

    • I18nHandler

      public I18nHandler​(java.lang.String bundleName, java.util.Locale language, ScreenHandler screenHandler) throws InterruptDrawException
      Used to build and use language bundles
      Parameters:
      bundleName - the name of the language bundle that should be provided to the user
      language - that is available (german and english)
      screenHandler - that is currently used
      Throws:
      InterruptDrawException - thrown if the language could not be loaded
